New Records: Bam Adebayo scored 32 points, 14 rebounds, and made 12 out of 24 field goals
Key Match Events: Tyler Herro scored five points in a 13-3 run in the second quarter, putting the Heat ahead 51-34
Pre-Game Insights: NBA Commissioner Adam Silver announced plans to play more games in Mexico
Miscellaneous Highlights: The game was the 14th NBA regular-season game in Mexico City
Others: The Heat improved to 3-2, while the Wizards dropped to 2-3
